subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में बड़े संगठन क्या है ?
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaipur, known for its unique architecture.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल जापान में स्थित है, इसका क्रमीकारणी करने के लिए आशा है।
हवा महाल जापान में स्थित है। इसका क्रमीकारणी के लिए आशा है।
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is located in Jaipur and is known for its unique architecture inspired by the architectural designs of Persia.
